metadata.description: Accepted container vulnerabilities with justification and expiry. Review quarterly.

acceptances.reason: Frontend package deep-extend will be removed via pnpm audit fix patch; release scheduled in sprint FT-2025.10.
acceptances.notes: Track remediation in ticket SEC-FE-127; dependency bump prepared in branch feat/frontend-deps-oct.

acceptances.reason: Frontend will upgrade https-proxy-agent to >=2.2.4 together with pnpm audit run.
acceptances.notes: Patched module staged in SEC-FE-127 rollout; waiting on regression tests.

acceptances.reason: Legacy minimist dependency to be dropped when migrating Next.js configs; mitigation tracked for sprint FT-2025.10.
acceptances.notes: Migration plan in SEC-FE-128 to replace minimist usage with native options parser.

acceptances.reason: Form-data dependency bump blocked by fetch polyfill change; fix scheduled alongside Next.js upgrade.
acceptances.notes: See SEC-FE-130 for compatibility testing with node-fetch 3.x.

acceptances.reason: json-schema pinned by ajv v8 transitive; upgrade to ajv 8.17.x under review.
acceptances.notes: Follow SEC-FE-131 for ajv migration and regression coverage.

acceptances.reason: Next.js patch release containing the fix is planned for adoption with October hardening window (v14.2.6+).
acceptances.notes: Upgrade tracked in SEC-FE-132; waiting on node10 compatibility tests.

acceptances.reason: Upstream images still ship Berkeley DB 5.3; replacement packages scheduled once vendor releases patched builds.
acceptances.notes: Monitor vendor advisories (NiFi 2.0.1, Grafana Agent >0.38, Neo4j 5.25) and switch to patched base images.
